recipesJson.name: Live Mixing: 09/01/17
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
Taking a look at FLV Graham Cracker & Vanilla Bean by using them in a Milkshake Base
This recipe was made on LIVE MIXING: THE BREAK HAS ENDED (09/01/17)

reviews.text: This scratches all of my sweet tooth itches. Good mix that showcases the new flv flavors. It was really good at the shake but I am a little disappointed at loosing some of the graham cracker nuances, totally not your fault though.
